DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, lose #r%d HP.

jaina:FrostAffinityPower.NAME: Frost Affinity
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #bFrost card you play costs 2 less this turn.

jaina:FrozenPower.NAME: Frozen
DESCRIPTIONS: A #bFrozen creature loses his next action. NL #bFrozen effect can NOT stack.

jaina:IceBlockPower.NAME: Ice Block
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the next fatal damage you take.

DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #yIntagible after being attacked.

jaina:VaporizePower.NAME: Vaporize
